title: New Pixel 5, Bluetooth Raycon headset keeps disconnecting when on phone calls?
content: Had to replace my Pixel 3XL with a Pixel 5 a few days ago. The Raycon earbuds I've been using with my Pixel 3XL will not stay connected when on a phone call. They work fine when just listening to music or other apps. I did not have this issue with the 3XL either. Any ideas?
